item.title: ICUs overwhelmed with younger, sicker...
item.description:
www.msn.com
MIAMI — Inside a COVID-only intensive care unit at Jackson Memorial Hospital in Miami, all eight beds are filled with patients. Six of the eight patients are younger than 50 years old. None of them has been vaccinated against COVID-19.
